text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Eh? You want me to join 
a casual football match?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I've been asked to join a team match 
on our next day off. I'm looking for other 
members right now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I like watching football, but I haven't 
really played in a lot of matches……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Eh, really? You were incredible at minifootball 
during the last sports event though!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
W-Was I? I did often play with a ball when 
I was little, with dad and friends……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you've been playing since you 
were a kid……! No wonder you could 
pull off those magnificent dribbles!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! It was really cool, almost like 
you were friends with the ball!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Yes! That's why I think having you 
on our team would be great!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hmm～…… Well, if you're going that far～ 
…… Maybe I'll try joining……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Woah, really? 
Thank you so much!
